title: PRAISE to thee, thou great Creator

verses.text:
PRAISE to thee, thou great Creator!
Praise to thee from every tongue!
Join, my soul, with every creature,
Join the universal song.

Father, source of all compassion,
Pure, unbounded grace to thee;
Hail the God of our salvation,
Praise the Holy Trinity.

For thy countless blessing given,
For the hope of future joy,
Sound his name through earth and heaven,
Let thy praise our tongues employ.

Joyfully on earth adore him,
Till in heaven your song you raise;
Then, enraptured, fall before him,
Lost in wonder, love, and praise.
